pages.title: categories
pages.text: JS插件方便实现一些特效的好用的组件hexo搭建博客的方法，命令行，目录结构闲聊和技术不想关的内容

posts.title: animate.css
posts.text: A cross-browser library of CSS animations项目地址https://github.com/daneden/animate.css 演示地址https://daneden.github.io/animate.css/ 12345678910111213141516171819//为元素添加动画效果$('#yourElement').addClass('animated bounceOutLeft');or$('#yourElement').animateCss('bounce');//添加动画执行之后的回调$('#yourElement').animateCss('bounce', function() { // Do somthing after animation});//调整动画执行的参数#yourElement { //持续时间 -vendor-animation-duration: 3s; //延迟多久后执行 -vendor-animation-delay: 2s; //执行次数 -vendor-animation-iteration-count: infinite;}

posts.title: Notyf
posts.text: Notyf is a dead simple, responsive, vanilla javascript notification plugin. No jQuery required.项目地址https://github.com/caroso1222/notyf 123456789101112131415//实例化var notyf = new Notyf();//实例化传入配置参数var notyf = new Notyf({ delay:1000, alertIcon: 'fa fa-exclamation-circle', confirmIcon: 'fa fa-check-circle' })//警告弹框，红色notyf.alert('aaa');//通知弹框，绿色notyf.confirm('bbb');

posts.title: jqPaginator
posts.text: 基于jquery的分页组件项目地址https://github.com/keenwon/jqPaginator 演示地址http://jqpaginator.keenwon.com/ 12345678<ul class="pagination" id="pagination"></ul>$('#pagination').jqPaginator({ totalPages: 100, visiblePages: 10, currentPage: 1, onPageChange: function(num, type) { }});

posts.title: hexo命令
posts.text: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324npm install hexo-cli -gnpm install hexo --savehexo init//进入空白文件夹搭建脚手架，生成hexo项目框架hexo g//generate新的文件关系hexo s//server本地展示hexo d // 部署到github.iohexo d -g//在部署前先生成npm install hexo-deployer-git --save//安装扩展，否则 deloyer not found:githexo new post "article title"//发布新文章

posts.title: first demo
posts.text: 人在杭州已经叠甲十年

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
